backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining weather types and mock query methods for current, daily, and weekly forecasts with a simple in-memory cache.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting an old cache entry format into a new one with a validity flag and default handling.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose and functionality of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global style sheet defining color variables, dark mode tokens, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing location, weather fetching, theming, alerts, tab navigation, and backend publishing.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundIllust: Component rendering weather-themed background images with fade transitions and theme-based overlay shading.
frontend/src/components/BeachMarineScree: Displays marine conditions for a selected beach location with loading, error, and empty states, showing temperature, waves, and other metrics.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a bottom navigation bar with tabs for different app sections and handles tab switching.
frontend/src/components/DriverWeatherPan: Shows driving-related weather advisories, route analysis, and loading/error states based on current and route-specific weather data.
frontend/src/components/FarmerGardenWeat: Displays agriculture-focused weather advisories including frost, soil, precipitation, planting, and spraying guidance.
frontend/src/components/FloatingAutocomp: Renders a floating dropdown positioned relative to an anchor, updating on scroll/resize and closing on outside click.
frontend/src/components/ImminentWeatherA: Shows a dismissible banner for imminent weather alerts with severity-based styling and icons.
frontend/src/components/InitialRenderErr: Error boundary that catches initial render errors and displays a fallback UI with reload option and optional error details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageDropdown: Renders a portal-based language selection dropdown positioned relative to a trigger button and closes on outside click or escape.
frontend/src/components/LaundryDryingRec: Displays best and alternative laundry drying times or a warning when conditions are unfavorable, based on weather data.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Provides a searchable location input with autocomplete results and displays or clears the currently selected location.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarAlert: Displays a dismissible alert banner for radar alerts with severity-based styling.
Provides a settings panel to enable alerts and adjust alert radius via a sheet UI.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarEmpty: Shows an empty-state message when no radar data is available.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarForec: Renders a centered warning label indicating forecast uncertainty.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarFrame: Toggle UI to switch between forecast and past radar frame modes.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarInfoP: Displays summarized radar information such as start time, duration, intensity, and direction.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarLayer: Sheet UI for enabling or disabling various radar overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarMap.t: Initializes and updates a Leaflet map with location markers and dynamic radar/overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarOverl: Shows loading, error, or no‑data messages related to non-precipitation overlay layers.
frontend/src/components/radar/RadarPlayb: Provides playback controls and a timeline slider for navigating radar frames.
frontend/src/components/RadarScreen.tsx: Combines radar map, playback, overlays, alerts, and location search to display interactive past and forecast radar frames.
frontend/src/components/RouteLocationSea: Searches for route locations with autocomplete and allows selecting or clearing a chosen location.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Provides a weather-based theme context and wraps children with dark or light mode styling.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Shows current weather details, air quality, UV info, advisories, and laundry recommendations with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeocodingSearch.ts: Debounces user input and performs geocoding queries with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useImminentWeatherAle: Manages imminent weather alerts with dismissal persistence and Android bridge notifications using sessionStorage and evaluated alert data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity login, state management, and persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarineConditions.t: Fetches marine condition data via React Query using Open-Meteo Marine API based on coordinates.
Handles saving, loading, and clearing a persisted location in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublishWidgetWeath: Provides a mutation to publish weather data to the backend for widget use, with graceful error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that query hooks are implemented elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarAlerts.ts: Generates radar-based severe weather alerts using simple heuristics and stores user alert settings and dismissals.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarOverlayData.t: Fetches weather, air quality, and temperature grid data to produce overlay information for radar maps.
frontend/src/hooks/useRadarPlayback.ts: Controls radar animation playback with play, pause, seek, and frame label helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useRainViewer.ts: Fetches and validates RainViewer radar data via backend actor with caching and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteWeatherAnalys: Interpolates route points, fetches weather for each, transforms the data, and runs a route weather analysis via react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: A hook that syncs a React state value with sessionStorage using a key and default value.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Fetches weather and air quality data, transforms it into a structured WeatherData object, and exposes it via react-query.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides locale state, persistence, and translation lookup via a React context.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains Turkish and English translation keys and text used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: A hook that retrieves the I18n context and throws if used outside the provider.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, weather-based color variants, and glass-like UI utilities.
frontend/src/lib/clothingAdvisories.ts: Generates clothing recommendations based on temperature, precipitation, and wind using weather data.
frontend/src/lib/driverAdvisories.ts: Computes road ice and fog risk levels using current and near-term weather conditions.
frontend/src/lib/farmerAdvisories.ts: Defines advisory interfaces and computes frost, soil moisture, precipitation, planting, and spraying recommendations based on hourly weather data.
frontend/src/lib/fetchWithTimeout.ts: Wraps fetch with an AbortController to add a configurable timeout and standardized timeout error.
frontend/src/lib/formatDailyForecastDate: Formats an ISO date into a localized short weekday‑month‑day string using Intl.DateTimeFormat.
frontend/src/lib/imminentWeatherAlerts.t: Analyzes the next hour of weather data to generate imminent rain, snow, storm, or fog alerts with severity levels.
frontend/src/lib/laundryDrying.ts: Calculates hourly drying scores, classifies conditions, and finds optimal drying time ranges using humidity, temperature, wind, and precipitation.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteo.ts: Fetches and normalizes weather data from Open‑Meteo APIs into a unified WeatherData or WeatherResponse format.
frontend/src/lib/openMeteoMarine.ts: Fetches marine conditions and complementary weather data, combining wave, wind, and visibility info with fallback estimation.
frontend/src/lib/radarNowcastSummary.ts: Generates a simple radar precipitation summary estimating start time, duration, intensity, and direction from radar frames.
frontend/src/lib/radarOverlays.ts: Computes display parameters for various radar overlay types and includes helpers for temperature colors and intensity.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewer.ts: Parses, normalizes, and filters RainViewer radar data and determines initial playback frame.
frontend/src/lib/rainviewerCache.ts: Handles caching, validating, and normalizing RainViewer data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/routeAnalysis.ts: Analyzes weather conditions along a route to compute risk factors and an overall risk level.
frontend/src/lib/tirePressure.ts: Calculates tire pressure adjustment recommendations based on temperature and vehicle type.
frontend/src/lib/weatherContrast.ts: Determines if a weather theme should use a dark background.
frontend/src/lib/weatherTheme.ts: Maps weather codes to themes, icons, and translation keys for descriptions.
frontend/src/lib/widgetWeatherPayload.ts: Builds backend-compatible weather payloads and generates stable publish keys for locations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and identity provider.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Declares the Android bridge interface for showing notifications.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, custom fonts, color tokens, container settings, and extended theme utilities.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Sets TypeScript options for Vite’s Node config, enabling ESNext modules and composite builds.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite config with React plugin, path aliasing, a dev server proxy to /api, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, including radar forecast requirements, known issues, and pending feature requests.
